reviews.text: There is a lot to like about this place.
reviews.title: Very good hotel in heart of Chengdu's shopping district

reviews.text: 1) The location is excellent, right in the center of town. From here you can really explore the downtown on foot, a nice touch. In addition there is a Chengdu tourist information center about 50 feet away.
reviews.title: Great hotel, clean, nice location, nice price

reviews.text: It is a little difficult to find as others have mentioned. If you print out the map with Chinese street names from their website your taxi driver should have no trouble finding it.
reviews.title: echo others' accolades

likes.liked: — furnishings were all brand new, and the room is very large

reviews.text: 2) The rooms are very well appointed and breakfast buffet is included in the price. There is wifi in the lobby.
reviews.title: What an incredible find

likes.liked: — Exceptional rooms, fantastic value for money, great location
likes.disliked: — Gym was adequate but not great; really hard to find

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The Hiayatt Garden Hotel opened in Chengdu in November 2007. It is located in the center of the city with access to modern shopping areas. It is about 40 minutes (100RMB by taxi) from the airport.
reviews.title: Great New Hotel
